entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:26 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -39.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 09:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -39.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -43.4°C
Wind: SE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 54 this morning and minus 49 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 38. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 36.
